body.name: Handheld Retro Game Console with 32G TF Card ,Preloaded 10,000+ Games, Retro Gaming Console Supported 11 Emulators 3.5-inch IPS Screen (Black)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 19 hrs 23 mins
features: 【Ugtenversi X6 Retro Gaming Console】comes with pre-installed 10,000+ classic games 32G TF game card ,support SFC GBC GBA GB FC NES MD MAME SMC CPS 11 big simulator games，with movies/music/picture query/calendar/clock function ，supports two-player games with connected controllers and large screen output.

【 high-resolution screen】Upgraded version handheld game console 3.5-inch IPS OCA fully laminated colour screen, the screen colour is fine and delicate and soft to effectively reduce eye fatigue, 640 * 480 high-resolution picture quality is clear, the visual angle of the eye is wide.
【Powerful chip function】handheld emulator High-performance 4-core ATJ2273S 32bit RISC support 60HZ high-frequency picture quality, can run large 2D/3D games,
【Powerful Battery]】emulator game handheld 2000mAh polymer lithium battery, fast energy storage charging for 1 hour, play for 4 hours! Battery life 4-5 hours

【Dual 3D Rocker Design】 This retro game console rocker features a semi-curved protrusion that fits the big mother finger better and is non-slip. You can choose the corresponding operation mode according to different games. The L R key design on the back allows you to release your vigor.If you meet any problems during the use of handheld game machine, please contact us in time, we will make a good solution for you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for Even a Savvy Gamer!!
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for my son-in-law for Christmas ….who’s got a fancy shmancy gaming setup in his gaming room. Omg…you’d have thought he was 5-yrs old getting his first remote controlled car!! Still plays it…loves it for ability to take wherever he goes!! He’s 29 yrs old ppl!! Lol

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The SD card fell inside the console as soon as we took it out from the box it’s not a good quality

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good bang for the buck
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This is a system that appeals to the old school gamers the most, but could also appeal to kids who are open minded and not obsessed with the latest and greatest. The library is MASSIVE! Especially for such a little device. My guess is there are 6000+ games on here, the game libraries are pretty well flushed out and it is probably above that number. These are games from all of the old systems, up until the early 2000, mind you the most graphically advanced are probably the GBC games but I haven’t even explored this thing fully so I could be wrong. I was surprised at the amount of RPG games, as well as shooters.The system itself is light weight, so I would make sure not to drop it, but it survived a 4 foot fall and did fine. It has a very square shape and the controls are responsive and what you expect. The battery can be a bit laggy while charging, but once it’s charged, man oh man, it can last awhile, full brightness was 4 hours, but that was with a third of the battery charged on the first usage. I turned it down to half brightness and got a 8 hr run out of it(over 5-6 days) usually 2ish hours at a time. The screen is plenty bright and has a nostalgic type of vibe for myself. You could hook it to a TV, I would probably find it awkward, but it’s something you could do. The sound gets quite loud, but lacks Bass, meh, I personally don’t care about that with bit music and soundtracks. It does have a feature where you could add different music to it and comes with a couple songs. I’m assuming that’s what the card reader is for. Anyways I think it’s lovely for my old school gaming needs.

reviews.reviewerName: The screen is terrible, hurts to look at. Have to look at it from the side for to be able to see the screen clearly.. and for anyone wondering there is no Pokémon or Mario on here either.
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars The screen is very bad
reviews.reviewText: The screen is terrible hurts to look at for more than 3 minutes. Have to look at the screen from the side for it to even look clear. And for anyone wondering. No it does not have Pokémon nor does it have Mario…

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great for Easy Nostalgia
reviews.reviewText: This is a great device to get your fix of some old favorite games.The games run well and you can easily find other games on the Internet and copy them to the included SD card, like the Super Mario Bros. series.The games are named so weirdly though and start with a number.I recommended putting the SD card in a computer, find your favorite games and rename them without the leading numbers so then you can browse them in alphabetical order.Then move all the remaining numbered ones you don't care about to another folder.Alternatively, there are ways to rename many files at once following a pattern. Search the Internet.It is a little cheap feeling and I'm not sure how long the controls with last. It is not very comfortable for long gaming sessions because of the non-ergonomic shape.It has options for an external controller and video out (which no modern TVs have so you would need to buy an adapter too). There are likely better options out there for big screen nostalgic gaming, but I didn't look. Like I said, this is nice to get your fix, but not for serious gamers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best game ever
reviews.reviewText: Super good quality good resolution works perfect I own 3 different ones and this is the best

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars It works alright, but there's hidden inappropriate games
reviews.reviewText: There doesn't seem to be any oversight about what is on this game console.The main screen set up is very outdated and when you go back to the titles, you have to start at the beginning of the list so it's hard to get all the way to the bottom eventually.The game play is alright, but there are so many titles that you can't possibly play/read all of them in a reasonable amount of time.We just happened to find some hidden things that maybe should not be there...for example, there is a game called the Little Mermaid, but there is also one called The Little Naked Girl or something which is the exact same game as The Little Mermaid- BUT all the characters are naked?!Who knows how many of these types of games there are, I couldn't get though all the games.I thought it was very weird. I don't know if Amazon goes through items like this, maybe they should or put some kind of disclaimer that these are random downloads that can portray anything.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It is a very fun game console
reviews.reviewText: Let me tell you, this Handheld Retro Game Console is quite the marvel. It's proven its mettle with nearly every game I've thrown at it. It also has a multimedia emulator console that allows you to watch movies/music. As for the Battery, I'd rate it as reasonably decent and can last more than 6 hours to let you play enough at once. The screen is also very nice.
